about_the_game:
UnnamedGame RPG is a semi idle-batller RNG-hell RPG game, that has been released early access so players can begin climbing the online leaderboard!

This game features different areas, enemies, and equipment, for the player to find the best way to efficiently gain experience and climb the leaderboard. There is currently a Discord where the players and developer (myself) interact to talk about balancing, updates to prioritize, and any other fun ideas!

In this game, each piece of gear you get is essential. The enemies each drop a different piece of gear, the more difficult the enemy, the better the drop. The faster you get the gear, the sooner you will be able to start working your way up the leaderboard.

Currently featuring:
  • character customization
  • 35 equippable items
  • hundreds of character customization variations
  • 14 enemies
  • 16 bosses
  • a town where the player can shop and bank items
  • RNG enriched incremental experience
  • In-game unlockable wikipedia
  • Competitive leaderboard
  • Accumulative leaderboard


and Much More to Come!

[The game will be expanding as time goes on, the description is to date as of 6/14/2022]

About the Game

UnnamedGame RPG is a semi idle-batller RNG-hell RPG game, that has been released early access so players can begin climbing the online leaderboard!

This game features different areas, enemies, and equipment, for the player to find the best way to efficiently gain experience and climb the leaderboard. There is currently a Discord where the players and developer (myself) interact to talk about balancing, updates to prioritize, and any other fun ideas!

In this game, each piece of gear you get is essential. The enemies each drop a different piece of gear, the more difficult the enemy, the better the drop. The faster you get the gear, the sooner you will be able to start working your way up the leaderboard.

Currently featuring:
  • character customization
  • 35 equippable items
  • hundreds of character customization variations
  • 14 enemies
  • 16 bosses
  • a town where the player can shop and bank items
  • RNG enriched incremental experience
  • In-game unlockable wikipedia
  • Competitive leaderboard
  • Accumulative leaderboard


and Much More to Come!

[The game will be expanding as time goes on, the description is to date as of 6/14/2022]

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+ 32bit (64bit support in the works)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

name: UnnamedGame RPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy a semi-AFK RNG-HELL RPG game that is ever expanding, find loot, own, get owned, all in the name of RNG. Climb leaderboards for overall XP, gather money, and become a part of a growing game and community!
